Module fr.centralesupelec.is1220.GroupT_MyVelib_Poncelet_Hatano
Package fr.centralesupelec.is1220.Server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.centralesupelec.is1220.Server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Server

    This class represents the server which acts as the interface with the user and creates the instance of the problem.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Server​(java.lang.String name, int nbStations, int nbSlots, double dimension, int nbBikes)
      Creates an instance of the problem composed of N stations (with 50% of them being plus stations), M slots per station, Nb Bikes (30% of them are electrical) in a square of side of a given length.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server​(java.lang.String name,
              int nbStations,
              int nbSlots,
              double dimension,
              int nbBikes)
       throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates an instance of the problem composed of N stations (with 50% of them being plus stations), M slots per station, Nb Bikes (30% of them are electrical) in a square of side of a given length.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the instance.
        nbStations - the number of stations in the instance.
        nbSlots - the number of slots per stations.
        dimension - length of the side of the square.
        nbBikes - the number of bikes in the instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown if the configuration of stations, slots and bikes is impossible or if the dimension is negative.

      • addUser

        public void addUser​(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String cardType,
                    double balance)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Add an user to the instance.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the user.
        cardType - type of the card of the user : "NONE" for no card, "VLIBRE" for a vlibre card or "VMAX" for a vmax card.
        balance - balance of the credit card of the user.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown when the type of card of the user is misspelled.

      • rentBike

        public int rentBike​(int userID,
                    java.lang.String bikeType,
                    int stationID,
                    double time)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Allows an User to rent a Bike with a given type from a given station at a given time.
        Parameters:
        userID - the ID if the user who wants to rent a bike.
        bikeType - the type of the bike rent : "MECHANICAL" for a mechanical bike or "ELECTRICAL" for an electrical bike.
        stationID - the ID of the station where the bike is rent.
        time - the time when the bike is rent.
        Returns:
        the ID of the bike rent.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown when the bike's type, the user's ID, the station's ID or the time is misspelled or when the User have already a bike.

      • dropBike

        public void dropBike​(int userID,
                     int stationID,
                     double time)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Allows an user to drop a bike he has rent, in an given station at a given time.
        Parameters:
        userID - the ID if the user who wants to drop a bike.
        stationID - the ID of the station where the bike is dropped.
        time - the time when the bike is dropped.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown when the user's ID, the station's ID or the time is misspelled or when the User did not rent a bike.

      • planningRide

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> planningRide​(int userID,
                                                           java.lang.String bikeType,
                                                           double positionX,
                                                           double positionY,
                                                           double destinationX,
                                                           double destinationY)
                                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Compute a ride plan for an user at a given position who wants to go to a given destination with a given type of bike.
        Parameters:
        userID - the ID of the user.
        bikeType - the type of the bike used : "MECHANICAL" for a mechanical bike or "ELECTRICAL" for an electrical bike.
        positionX - the X coordinate of the position of the user.
        positionY - the Y coordinate of the position of the user.
        destinationX - the X coordinate of the destination of the user.
        destinationY - the Y coordinate of the destination of the user.
        Returns:
        the ID of the station of depart of the user and the ID of the station of arrival of the user.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown when the user'ID or the bike's type is misspelled or when the position or the destination of the user is unreachable.

      • sortStation

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> sortStation​(java.lang.String policy)
                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Compute a sorted list of the station's ID of the instance given an certain sort policy.
        Parameters:
        policy - the sort policy used : "USED" for sorting the station by the most used and "OCCUPATION" for sorting the station by the most occupied.
        Returns:
        the sorted list of IDs.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown when the policy is misspelled or when the end time of each station is not compute.

      • setEndTimeStation

        public void setEndTimeStation​(double time,
                              int stationID)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the time of end of service of a station which allowed to compute its occupation.
        Parameters:
        time - the end time of the station.
        stationID - the ID of the station.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown when the end time or the station's ID is misspelled.

      • setStateStation

        public void setStateStation​(java.lang.String state,
                            int stationID)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Allow to change the state of the station.
        Parameters:
        state - the new state of the station : "ONSERVICE" for activate the station or "OFFLINE" for shut it down.
        stationID - the ID of the station.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown when the station's ID or the state is misspelled or when the station is already in this state.
